title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Clarified preview behavior of remote GitHub MCP server in Copilot docs.
Added new permissions for secret scanning bypass requests in GitHub Apps.
Introduced `allow_advanced` option for code scanning in security config.
Added new private registry repository types (Hex, Pub, Python, Terraform).
summary:
- Clarified preview behavior of remote GitHub MCP server in Copilot docs.
- Added new permissions for secret scanning bypass requests in GitHub Apps.
- Introduced `allow_advanced` option for code scanning in security config.
- Removed "merge_queue" from branch protection rules.
- Added new private registry repository types (Hex, Pub, Python, Terraform).
- Updated OpenAPI descriptions and examples.
generated_title: Add secret scanning bypass permissions and code scanning options

original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Clarified preview behavior of remote GitHub MCP server in Copilot docs.
- Added new permissions for secret scanning bypass requests in GitHub Apps.
- Introduced `allow_advanced` option for code scanning in security config.
- Removed "merge_queue" from branch protection rules.
- Added new private registry repository types (Hex, Pub, Python, Terraform).
- Updated OpenAPI descriptions and examples.

### Title
Add secret scanning bypass permissions and code scanning options
